Sheen Brisals

Senior Engineer and Coach at LEGO Group

A seasoned software engineer, AWS Certified Solutions Architect and a team coach, currently at LEGO steering the cloud migration journey. Previously as a principal engineer, tech lead and development manager with leading organizations such as Oracle Corporation, Hewlett-Packard, Omron, TATA, BAe and others. Regular speaker at tech gatherings and company tech summits. Keen participant at Serverless and Microservices meetups in London, AWS conferences, Serverless Days (JeffConf) and others.

Title
To Serverless and Beyond! Successful eCommerce Migration at LEGO
Abstract

Connecting LEGO play experience with millions requires an innovative platform. This fueled the cloud migration of the legacy eCommerce application. This talk will walk you through the principles, the approach and the serverless technologies that made the vision a great success.
